summary: VMCI: Use threaded irqs instead of tasklets
details:
VMCI: Use threaded irqs instead of tasklets

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.8 by commit 548ea9dd5e01b0ecf53d2563004c80abd636743d, it was introduced in version v5.18 by commit 463713eb6164b6577f8e91447c7745628215531b. For more details please see the references link.
